ApiError.description: ApiError represents API errors. Used when an API throws an error, typically with a HTTP error response-code (3xx, 4xx, 5xx).

requestId.description: RequestID is the unique ID of the request

code.description: Code is the application relevant detail defined in the API or a common list.

message.description: Message is the explanation of the error which can be shown to the client user.

enabled.description: Enabled defines whether user can change branding settings.

id.description: Id is the Chrome extension ID.

offer.description: Offer defines whether Chrome extension banner should be displayed.

enabled.description: Enable defines whether user can change their email.

ConfigExternal.description: ConfigExternal represents external cloud integration settings.

connectUrl.description: ConnectUrl is the URL for connecting new Dropbox places.

enabled.description: Enabled defines whether Dropbox integration is enabled.

logoutUrl.description: ConnectUrl is the URL for Dropbox user logout.

ConfigExternalGoogleDrive.description: ConfigExternalGoogleDrive represents Google Drive integration settings.

connectUrl.description: ConnectUrl is the URL for connecting new Google Drive places.

enabled.description: Enabled defines whether Google Drive integration is enabled.

logoutUrl.description: ConnectUrl is the URL for Google Drive user logout.

connectUrl.description: ConnectUrl is the URL for connecting new OneDrive places.

enabled.description: Enabled defines whether OneDrive integration is enabled.

canChangePassword.description: CanChangePassword defines whether link passwords can be changed.

canChangeShortUrl.description: CanChangeShortUrl defines whether short URLs can be changed.

messageEditAllowed.description:
MessageEditEnabled defines whether current user is allowed to set a custom
link message.

messageEditEnabled.description: MessageEditEnabled defines whether custom link message feature is enabled.

socialEnabled.description: SocialEnabled defines whether social media buttons are displayed.

enabled.description: Enabled defines whether 2-Step authentication settings are enabled.

name.description: Name is the name of iOS media folder.
Name is the name of iOS media folder.

enabled.description: Enabled defines whether security page is enabled.

url.description: Url is the URL of the account/upgrade settings.

addUserUrl.description: AddUserUrl contains a custom URL for adding users.

buyResourcesUrl.description: BuyResourcesUrl contains a custom URL for buying more resources.

canChangeSpace.description: CanChangeSpace defines whether space can be assigned/modified for group users.

canChangeUsers.description: CanChangeUsers defines whether group users can be modified.

enabled.description: Enabled defines whether groups are enabled.

helpLanguage.description: HelpLanguage is the language for the help pages.

language.description:
Language is the current language code. If user did not set a preferred
language, Accept-Language HTTP header is used for default language
detection.

languages.description: Languages is a list of languages for the web application.

ConfigLocalizationLanguage.description: ConfigLocalizationLanguage represents a web application language.

language.description: Language is a short code for the language.

name.description: Name is the full name of the language.

url.description: Url is the URL for logout.

isMobile.description:
IsMobile defines whether user is using a mobile device. It is detected from
User-Agent header.

appGalleryUrl.description: AppGalleryUrl is the URL of HUAWEI AppGallery.

url.description: Url is the URL of Google Play store.
Url is the URL of Apple App store.

enabled.description: Enabled defines whether Office Web Apps integration is enabled.

extensions.description:
Extensions is a list of file extensions for which Office integration is
supported.

officeOnlineAllowed.description:
OfficeOnlineEnabled defines whether Office Online integration is allowed
for the current user.

officeOnlineDataLocale.description:
OfficeOnlineLocale is the default locale of the Office Online data (e.g.
Excel numbers and dates locale).

officeOnlineEnabled.description: OfficeOnlineEnabled defines whether Office Online integration is enabled.

officeOnlineLocale.description: OfficeOnlineLocale is the locale of the Office Online web interface.

enabled.description: Enable defines whether user can change their password.

marketingUrl.description:
MarketingUrl is the URL of the page that contains more info about the
product. It is used for intro modal in the web application and in the link
page footer.

nameVisible.description: NameVisible defines whether product name should be visible on auth pages.

enabled.description: Enabled defines whether snapshots are enabled.

ConfigTemplates.description: ConfigTemplates represents empty documents templates settings.

enabled.description: Enabled defines whether empty documents templates are enabled.

templates.description: Templates is a list of empty documents templates.

emptyEnabled.description: EmptyEnabled defines whether trash can be emptied.

ConfigUser.description: ConfigUser represents the current user info.

email.description: Email is the user's email address.

firstName.description: FirstName is the user's first name. Can be empty.

hasPassword.description:
HasPassword defines if user's password is set. User can be without a
password if they signed in with Google.

id.description: Id is the user's unique ID.

lastName.description: LastName is the user's last name. Can be empty.

phoneNumber.description: PhoneNumber is the user's phone number. It is defined in special cases.

enabled.description: Enabled defines whether document viewer is enabled.

FilesListRecursiveItem.description: FilesListRecursiveItem represents recursive file list item.

type.description: Type is the type of the item.

conflictResolution.description: ConflictResolution defines how the conflicts are resolved.

id.description: Id is the unique id of the user.

UserAttributes.description: UserAttributes represents user attributes. By default it has only hasCloud property but it might return others.

UserEdit.description: UserEdit represents the user edit structure.

appPassword.description: HTTP Basic auth using App passwords.

204.description: Nothing to do. This can occur when all items have conflict and the conflict resolution is SKIP.

400.description: Invalid request data, Link not found or Invalid password

204.description: Nothing to do. This can occur when all items have conflict and the conflict resolution is SKIP.

get.description:
Get a recursive stream of files and folders.

## Example response

```json
> GET /content/api/v2.1/mounts/f13b5804-563d-4aed-b831-ca0246a1cad1/files/listrecursive?path=/path/to/dir HTTP/1.1
>
< HTTP/1.1 200 OK
< Content-Type: application/x-ndjson; charset=utf-8
< Transfer-Encoding: chunked
<
{"type":"file","path":"/","file":{"name":"1","type":"dir","modified":1487861241075,"size":0,"contentType":"","tags":{}}}
{"type":"file","path":"/01ab.jpg","file":{"name":"01ab.jpg","type":"file","modified":1494936799097,"size":36494,"contentType":"image/jpeg","hash":"2eedb741f199ecc19f1ba815d3d9914d","tags":{}}}
{"type":"file","path":"/10 (1).txt","file":{"name":"10 (1).txt","type":"file","modified":1559913936402,"size":3,"contentType":"text/plain","hash":"31d30eea8d0968d6458e0ad0027c9f80","tags":{}}}
{"type":"file","path":"/2","file":{"name":"2","type":"dir","modified":1487861247967,"size":0,"contentType":"","tags":{}}}
{"type":"file","path":"/2/3","file":{"name":"3","type":"dir","modified":1487861253650,"size":0,"contentType":"","tags":{}}}
```

## Example response for an offline device

```json
> GET /content/api/v2.1/mounts/f13b5804-563d-4aed-b831-ca0246a1cad1/files/listrecursive?path=/path/to/dir HTTP/1.1
>
< HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
< Content-Length: 115
< Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
<
{"error":{"code":"DeviceOffline","message":"Device is offline"},"requestId":"7d17fa00-eea6-40d6-4ea8-4ef1496530ae"}
```

## External devices

For external cloud devices list recursive only works if the device is
synchronized. If the device is not synchronized the error code will be `FilesNotSynced`.

## Errors

If an error occurs when list items have already been sent the response will end
with an error item:

```json
> GET /content/api/v2.1/mounts/f13b5804-563d-4aed-b831-ca0246a1cad1/files/listrecursive?path=/path/to/dir HTTP/1.1
>
< HTTP/1.1 200 OK
< Content-Type: application/x-ndjson; charset=utf-8
< Transfer-Encoding: chunked
<
{"type":"file","path":"/","file":{"name":"","type":"dir","modified":1578316978020,"size":0,"contentType":"","tags":{}}}
{"type":"file","path":"/.bin","file":{"name":".bin","type":"dir","modified":1578316950052,"size":0,"contentType":"","tags":{}}}
{"type":"file","path":"/.bin/JSONStream","file":{"name":"JSONStream","type":"file","modified":1578316950024,"size":20,"contentType":"application/octet-stream","tags":{}}}
{"type":"error","error":{"code":"DeviceOffline","message":"Device is offline"}}
```

## Paths

All paths in items are relative to the specified path. The first item is always
an file info for the specified path which means that the first item will always
have path `/`.
get.summary: Get a recursive stream of files and folders

post.description: File can be uploaded either using a multi-part form or directly. You can use Chunked transfer encoding if the size of the file is not known in advance (streaming upload).

parameters.description: Name of the uploaded file. If this parameter is not set and multipart body is used, the file name from the multipart body will be used (this parameter takes precedence). If raw request body is used this parameter is required.
parameters.name: filename

parameters.description: Return full file info (`FilesFile`) in the response.
parameters.name: info

parameters.description: Overwrite an existing file.
parameters.name: overwrite

parameters.description: Overwrite an existing file if modified matches.
parameters.name: overwriteIfModified

parameters.description: Overwrite an existing file if size matches.
parameters.name: overwriteIfSize

parameters.description: Overwrite an existing file if hash matches.
parameters.name: overwriteIfHash

parameters.description: Overwrite an existing file if other parameters match (e.g. overWriteIfModified) but create a new file if the old one does not exist.
parameters.name: overwriteIgnoreNonexistent

parameters.description: Overwrite an existing file.
parameters.name: autorename

parameters.description: Set custom value for modified. Current time by default.
parameters.name: modified

parameters.description: Tags for the new file. Format: key=value
parameters.name: tags
